title: Create Monitoring Tables for 50x30 Surveys
text: goal tbls50x30 create display tables monitoring 50x30 surveys.

title: Create Monitoring Tables for 50x30 Surveys
text: can install development version tbls50x30 like :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("arthur-shaw/tbls50x30")

what: Produces table for sales and production of milk or eggs — anim_prod_sales
title: Produces table for sales and production of milk or eggs — anim_prod_sales
text: Produces table sales production milk eggs

title: Produces table for sales and production of milk or eggs — anim_prod_sales
code: anim_prod_sales(   livestock_df,   cases,   anim_id_var,   anim_vals,   produced_var,   produced_val = 1,   sold_var,   sold_val = 1,   amt_sold_vars,   amt_sold_dk_val,   group_var,   table_title,   anim_type_label )

title: Produces table for sales and production of milk or eggs — anim_prod_sales
text: livestock_df Data frame. Livestock ownership egg milk production sales. cases Data frame. Case include analysis anim_id_var Atomic character vector. Name ID variable livestock roster. anim_vals Numeric vector. Values anim_id_var identify milk- egg-producing animals, respectively. produced_var Atomic character vector. Variable egg/milk production. produced_val Atomic numeric vector. Value produced_var indicate production. sold_var Atomic character vector. Variable egg/milk sales. sold_val Atomic numeric vector. Value sold_var indicate sales. amt_sold_vars Character vector. Name variable(s) capture sales revenue. cases, single variable; others, one variable total value, another unit value. amt_sold_dk_val Atomic numeric vector. Value "know" (DK) option sales revenue. group_var Atomic character vector. Name grouping variable table_title Atomic character vector. Title table. anim_type_label Atomic character vector. Column label count milk/egg producing animals.

title: Produces table for sales and production of milk or eggs — anim_prod_sales

Create cow displacement table — cow_displacement
code: cow_displacement(   hhold_df,   cases,   animal_var,   bull_val = 10,   cow_val = 12,   steer_heifer_val = 13,   calf_val = 14,   group_var )

title: Create cow displacement table — cow_displacement
text: hhold_df Data frame. household-level variables. cases Data frame. Case include analysis animal_var Atomic character vector. Name livestock ownership variable, appears Designer. bull_val Atomic numeric vector. Value bull answer option. cow_val Atomic numeric vector. Value cow answer option. steer_heifer_val Atomic numeric vector. Value steer/heifer answer option. calf_val Atomic numeric vector. Value calf answer option. group_var Atomic character vector. Name grouping variable

title: Create cow displacement table — cow_displacement
Create crop labor table — crop_labor
Create crop labor table — crop_labor
code: crop_labor(   hhold_df,   cases,   grew_crops_var,   grew_crops_val = 1,   paid_var,   free_var,   members_df,   member_worked_var,   member_worked_val = 1,   group_var )

title: Create crop labor table — crop_labor
text: hhold_df Data frame. Household-level variables. cases Data frame. Case include analysis. grew_crops_var Atomic character vector. Name variable indicates whether grew crops. grew_crops_val Atomic numeric vector. Value grew_crops_var indicate crops grown. paid_var Atomic character vector. Name variable categories paid crop labor, appears Designer. free_var Atomic character vector. Name variable categories free/exchange crop labor, appears Designer. members_df Data frame. Household member-level data. member_worked_var Atomic character vector. Name variable indicates whether member worked grow crops. member_worked_val Atomic numeric vector. Value member_worked_var indicating member worked. group_var Atomic character vector. Name grouping variable

code: crop_types(   crop_df,   cases,   crop_type_var,   temp_crop_val = 1,   perm_crop_val = 2,   group_var )

text: crop_df Data frame parcel-plot-crops cases Data frame cases include analysis. crop_type_var Charcter. Name crop type column. temp_crop_val Numeric. Value temporary crop option. perm_crop_val Numeric. Value permanent crop option. group_var Character. Name grouping variable column (e.g., team, region, etc.).

what: Create table of income sources — income_sources
title: Create table of income sources — income_sources
Create table of income sources — income_sources
code: income_sources(   hhold_df,   crop_var,   livestock_var,   temp_crop_df,   temp_crop_var,   temp_crop_val = 1,   perm_crop_df,   perm_crop_var,   perm_crop_val = 1,   processed_df,   processed_var,   processed_val = 1,   anim_df,   sold_live_anim_var,   slaughter_anim_var,   slaughter_anim_val = 1,   sold_live_poultry_var,   slaughter_poultry_var,   slaughter_poultry_val = 1,   milk_var,   milk_val = 1,   eggs_var,   eggs_val = 1,   oth_anim_prod_df,   oth_anim_var,   oth_anim_val = 1,   cases,   group_var )

title: Create table of income sources — income_sources
text: hhold_df Data frame. Household-level data. crop_var Character. Indicator variable: grow crops. livestock_var Character. Indicator variable: raise livestock. temp_crop_df Data frame. Temporary crop disposition data frame. temp_crop_var Character. Indicator variable: sell temporary crops. temp_crop_val Numeric. Value: sell crops. perm_crop_df Data frame. Permanent crop disposition data frame. perm_crop_var Character. Indicator variable: sell permanent crops. perm_crop_val Numeric. Value: sell crops. processed_df Data frame. Processed crops. processed_var Character. Indicator variable: sell processed crops. processed_val Numeric. Value: sell processed crop. anim_df Data frame. Livestock data frame. sold_live_anim_var Character. Indicator variable: sold live animals. slaughter_anim_var Character. Indicator variable: sold slaughtered animal. slaughter_anim_val Numeric. Value: sold slaughtered animal. sold_live_poultry_var Character. Indicator variable: sold live poultry. slaughter_poultry_var Character. Indicator variable: sold slaughtered poultry. slaughter_poultry_val Numeric. Value: sold slaughtered poultry. milk_var Character. Indicator variable: sold milk. milk_val Numeric. Value: sold milk. eggs_var Character. Indicator variable: sold eggs. eggs_val Numeric. Value: sold eggs. oth_anim_prod_df Data frame. Roster animal products. oth_anim_var Character. Indicator variable: sold animal products. oth_anim_val Numeric. Value: sold animal products. cases Data frame. Cases include table analysis. group_var Character. Name group variable.

title: Create table of income sources — income_sources

Create livestock labor table — livestock_labor_tbl
code: livestock_labor_tbl(   hhold_df,   cases,   have_anim_var,   have_anim_val = 1,   anim_labor_df,   anim_labor_id_var,   anim_labor_var,   anim_labor_none_val = 0,   hhold_labor_vals = c(1, 2, 3),   free_labor_val = 4,   paid_labor_val = 5,   group_var )

title: Create livestock labor table — livestock_labor_tbl
text: hhold_df Data frame. Household-level data. cases Data frame. Cases include analysis. have_anim_var Character. Indicator variable: whether raise livestock. have_anim_val Numeric. Indicator value: raise livestock anim_labor_df Data frame. Roster livestock labor. anim_labor_id_var Character. Labor ID variable livestock labor roster. anim_labor_var Character. Number workers variable. anim_labor_none_val Numeric. Value indicatoing workers. hhold_labor_vals Numeric vector. Codes household labor categories. free_labor_val Numeric. Value free labor. paid_labor_val Numeric. Value paid labor. group_var Character. Name group variable.

title: Create livestock labor table — livestock_labor_tbl

title: Create table on product production and sales — other_prod_sales
text: hhold_df Data frame. Household-level data. product_df Data frame. Product-level data. cases Data frame. Case include analysis practice_var Atomic character vector. Name ID variable whether practice production. practice_val Atomic numeric vector. Value practice_var indicate practicing. products_var Atomic character vector. Name variable items produced, appears Designer. sold_var Atomic character vector. Variable egg/milk sales. sold_val Atomic numeric vector. Value sold_var indicate sales. amt_sold_vars Character vector. Name variable(s) capture sales revenue. cases, single variable; others, one variable total value, another unit value. amt_sold_dk_val Atomic numeric vector. Value "know" (DK) option sales revenue. group_var Atomic character vector. Name grouping variable table_title Atomic character vector. Title table.

code: perm_crop_harvest(   parcel_plot_crop_df,   cases,   crop_id_var,   crop_vals,   produce_var,   harvest_var,   harvest_val = 1,   group_var )

title: Create permanent crop harvest table — perm_crop_harvest
text: parcel_plot_crop_df Data frame parcel-plot-crop-level observations. cases Data frame cases include analysis. Data frame must contain interview__id grouping variable indicated group_var parameter crop_id_var Atomic character vector. Name crop ID variable character. crop_vals Numeric vector. Codes crops temporary crops. produce_var Atomic character vector. Name variable indicating whether crop produced. harvest_var Atomic character vector. Name variable indicating whether crop harvested. harvest_val Atomic numeric vector. Value harvest_var indicates crop harvested. group_var Atomic character vector. Name grouping variable

title: Create permanent crop harvest table — perm_crop_harvest

title: Create permanent crop sales table — perm_crop_sales
text: crops_sales_df Data frame. Crop sales data. cases Data frame cases include analysis. Data frame must contain interview__id grouping variable indicated group_var parameter crop_id_var Atomic character vector. Name crop ID variable character. crop_vals Numeric vector. Codes identify permanent crops. sold_var Atomic character vector. Name variable indicates whether crop sold. sold_val Atomic numeric vector. Value sold_var indicates crop sold. amt_sold_vars Character vector. Name variable(s) capture sales revenue. cases, single variable; others, one variable total value, another unit value. amt_sold_dk_val Atomic numeric vector. Value "know" (DK) option sales revenue. group_var Atomic character vector. Name grouping variable

code: process_crop_prod(   hhold_df,   temp_crops_var,   perm_crops_var,   processed_var,   processed_val = 1,   products_var,   cases,   product_df,   sold_var,   sold_val = 1,   amt_sold_vars,   amt_sold_dk_val,   group_var )

title: Create stats on crop processing — process_crop_prod
text: hhold_df Household data frame temp_crops_var Character. Indicator variable: temporary crop harvested. perm_crops_var Character. Indicator variable: permanent crop harvested. processed_var Character. Indicator variable: crops processed. processed_val Numeric. Value indicator: crops processed. products_var Character. Name variable Designer: processed products. cases Data frame. Case include analysis product_df Data frame. roster processed crops. sold_var Character. Indicator variable: whether product sold. sold_val Numeric. Value indicator: product sold. amt_sold_vars Character vector. Name(s) variables sales values. amt_sold_dk_val Numeric. Value "know" value. group_var Character. Name group variable.

title: Create stats on crop processing — process_crop_prod

what: Create table for sector labor — sector_labor

Create table for sector labor — sector_labor
code: sector_labor(   hhold_df,   produce_var,   produce_val = 1,   cases,   labor_var,   hhold_labor_vals = c(1, 2, 3),   free_labor_val = 4,   paid_labor_val = 5,   group_var,   table_title,   sector_label )

title: Create table for sector labor — sector_labor
text: hhold_df Data frame. Household-level data. produce_var Character. Indicator variable: whether engaged sector. produce_val Numeric. Value: engaged sector. cases Data frame. Cases include table computations. labor_var Character. Name labor categories used. Name multi-select question Designer. hhold_labor_vals Numeric vector. Codes answers corresponding household labor. free_labor_val Numeric. Code free labor. paid_labor_val Numeric. Code paid labor. group_var Character. Name group variable. table_title Character. Title table. sector_label Character. Label first column counts households engaged sector.

title: Create table for sector labor — sector_labor

Value harvest_var indicates crop harvested. why_not_harvest_var Atomic character vector. Name variable, appears Designer, captures reason(s) crop harvested. group_var Atomic character vector. Name grouping variable json_qnr_path Character. Path JSON file describes questionnaire.

text: Use susometa get labels questionnaire metadata. {susopara} split, susometa claimed questionnaire metadata functions. Use latest functions perform action extracting multi-select question answer options constructing variable labels.
